sentences.sContent: Since there is only one singleton instance, any instance fields of a singleton will occur only once per class, just like static fields.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since there is only one singleton instance, any instance fields of a singleton will occur only once per class, just like static fields.
sentences.sCn: 由于只有一个单实例，单例对象的域只会在一个类中出现一次，就像静态域一样。
